items.name: §bEnchanted Diamond
items.description: Packed diamond dust that glows with latent energy.
items.obtain: Combine 160 Diamonds in a 5x3 crafting grid.

items.name: §6Enchanted Stick
lore: §7Infused with blaze powder and ancient sap.
items.description: Perfect handle material for high-tier weapons.
items.obtain: Empower sticks with blaze powder and more sticks.

items.name: §bEnchanted Diamond Sword
items.description: Channel two enchanted diamonds onto a steady handle.
items.obtain: Craft using 2 Enchanted Diamonds and 1 Stick.

items.name: §dMage Staff
items.description: A staff imbued with arcane energy.
items.obtain: Craft with enchanted diamonds and a stick.

items.name: §aRanger Bow
items.description: A precise bow for long-range attacks.
items.obtain: Craft with enchanted diamonds and string.

items.name: §cMelee Axe
items.description: A heavy axe for close combat.
items.obtain: Craft with enchanted diamonds and sticks.

items.name: §dMage Sword
items.obtain: Craft with enchanted diamonds and a mage staff.

items.name: §aRanger Crossbow
items.obtain: Craft with enchanted diamonds and tripwire.

items.name: §cMelee Mace
items.description: A spiked mace for crushing blows.

items.name: §dMagic Arrow
items.obtain: Craft with enchanted diamonds and arrows.

items.name: §2Poison Arrow
items.obtain: Craft with spider eyes and arrows.

items.name: §cFire Arrow
items.obtain: Craft with blaze powder and arrows.

items.name: §dMage Helmet
items.description: A helmet that boosts magical abilities.

items.name: §cDamage Augment
items.description: An augment that boosts weapon damage.
items.obtain: Craft with nether stars and diamonds.

items.name: §bMana Augment
items.description: An augment that boosts mana capacity.

items.name: §eSpeed Augment
items.description: An augment that boosts movement speed.

items.name: §aHealth Augment
items.description: An augment that boosts max health.
items.obtain: Craft with golden apples and diamonds.

items.name: §9Defense Augment
items.description: An augment that boosts armor defense.

items.name: §3Fishing Rod
items.obtain: Craft with enchanted sticks and string.

items.name: §3Bait
items.obtain: Craft with carrots and enchanted diamonds.

items.name: §eFertilizer
items.obtain: Craft with bone meal and enchanted diamonds.

items.name: §eWatering Can
items.obtain: Craft with buckets and enchanted diamonds.

items.name: §6Bark Stripper
items.obtain: Craft with shears and enchanted diamonds.

items.name: §eEnchanted Golden Apple
items.obtain: Craft with gold blocks and apples.

items.name: §eCake
items.obtain: Craft with milk, sugar, eggs, and wheat.

items.name: §fEnchanted Iron
items.description: Packed iron dust that glows with latent energy.
items.obtain: Combine 160 Iron Ingots in a 5x3 crafting grid.

items.name: §eEnchanted Gold
items.description: Packed gold dust that glows with latent energy.
items.obtain: Combine 160 Gold Ingots in a 5x3 crafting grid.

items.name: §9Enchanted Lapis
items.description: Packed lapis dust that glows with latent energy.
items.obtain: Combine 160 Lapis Lazuli in a 5x3 crafting grid.

items.name: §cEnchanted Redstone
items.description: Packed redstone dust that glows with latent energy.
items.obtain: Combine 160 Redstone Dust in a 5x3 crafting grid.

items.name: §fEnchanted Iron Stick
items.description: Perfect handle material for basic weapons.
items.obtain: Empower sticks with iron ingots and more sticks.

items.name: §eEnchanted Gold Stick
items.description: Perfect handle material for enhanced weapons.
items.obtain: Empower sticks with gold ingots and more sticks.

items.name: §9Enchanted Lapis Stick
items.description: Perfect handle material for magical weapons.
items.obtain: Empower sticks with lapis lazuli and more sticks.

items.name: §cEnchanted Redstone Stick
items.description: Perfect handle material for epic weapons.
items.obtain: Empower sticks with redstone dust and more sticks.

items.name: §dMage Chestplate
items.description: A chestplate that greatly boosts magical abilities.

items.name: §8Barrier
items.description: An invisible block used for building.

items.name: §cPotion of Healing
items.obtain: Brew with nether wart and glistering melon.

items.name: §cPotion of Strength
items.obtain: Brew with nether wart and blaze powder.

items.name: §bPotion of Speed
items.obtain: Brew with nether wart and sugar.

items.name: §dPotion of Regeneration
items.obtain: Brew with nether wart and ghast tear.

items.name: §8Potion of Invisibility
items.description: A potion that makes you invisible.
items.obtain: Brew with nether wart and fermented spider eye.

items.name: §cRedstone Torch
items.description: A torch that emits redstone power.

items.name: §cRedstone Repeater
items.description: A device to repeat and delay redstone signals.
items.obtain: Craft with redstone, stone, and torches.

items.name: §cRedstone Comparator
items.description: A device to compare redstone signals.
items.obtain: Craft with redstone, quartz, and torches.

items.name: §7Piston
items.obtain: Craft with planks, cobblestone, iron, and redstone.

items.description: A bright block from the Nether.
